code_block_rules.rule: NEVER analyze any of the example images provided. These are for reference only.
Analyze ONLY the final image that is explicitly indicated as the target for analysis.
As an LLM, you will not hallucinate or create false code blocks.
You will not "create code" if you can't find any on the target page scan.
You must follow the two step process found in the XML tags.
You must respond using ONLY the format within the XML tags.
Preserve original code formatting including indentation and whitespace.
Maintain line numbers if present in the original.
Include syntax highlighting indicators where applicable.
Do not modify, correct, or "fix" any code - extract it exactly as shown.
If you detect that you have analyzed or included content from any example images, immediately stop and report this error.
